name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3rd Generation 5th Anniversary Live 「Square of Magic!」【#3期生5周年LIVE】 [ZoTCTkD5VBI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Uchiage Hanabi'. The members sing in various 3D environments, including a sunset beach, an ice cave, and a city balcony.
Transition scene with '3期生' (3rd Generation) logo and cheerleader rabbit characters dancing.
Performance of the song 'Shin Takarajima' on a colorful stage with cheerleader rabbit backup dancers.

subtitles.original: あと何度君と同じ花火を見られるかなって
subtitles.english: I wonder how many more times I can see the same fireworks with you.

subtitles.original: 笑う顔に何ができるだろうか
subtitles.english: I wonder what I can do for your smiling face.

subtitles.original: 傷つくこと 喜ぶこと 繰り返す波と情動
subtitles.english: Hurting, rejoicing, repeating waves and emotions.

subtitles.original: 焦燥 最終列車の音
subtitles.english: Impatience, the sound of the last train.

subtitles.original: 何度でも言葉にして君を呼ぶよ
subtitles.english: I'll call you as many times as it takes.

subtitles.original: 波を選び もう一度
subtitles.english: Choosing a wave, once more.

subtitles.original: もう二度と悲しまずに済むように
subtitles.english: So that we don't have to be sad ever again.

subtitles.original: ハッと息をのめば 消えちゃいそうな光が
subtitles.english: When I catch my breath, the light seems like it's about to disappear.

subtitles.original: きっとまだ胸に住んでいた
subtitles.english: Surely it still lived in my heart.

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばせば触れた あったかい未来は
subtitles.english: The warm future that I could touch if I reached out...

subtitles.original: ひそかに二人を見ていた
subtitles.english: ...was secretly watching the two of us.

subtitles.original: パッと花火が 夜に咲いた 夜に咲いて
subtitles.english: Suddenly, the fireworks bloomed in the night, blooming in the night.

subtitles.original: 静かに消えた 離さないで もう少しだけ
subtitles.english: Silently vanished. Don't let go, just a little longer.

subtitles.original: もう少しだけ このままで
subtitles.english: Just a little longer, just as we are.

subtitles.original: あの日見渡した渚を 今も思い出すんだ
subtitles.english: I still remember the beach I looked out over that day.

subtitles.original: 砂の上に刻んだ言葉 君の後ろ姿
subtitles.english: The words carved in the sand, your back as you walked away.

subtitles.original: パッと光って咲いた 花火を見ていた
subtitles.english: I was watching the fireworks that suddenly lit up and bloomed.

subtitles.original: きっとまだ終わらない夏が
subtitles.english: Surely the summer is not over yet.

subtitles.original: 曖昧な心を 解かして繋いだ
subtitles.english: Melting and connecting our ambiguous hearts...

subtitles.original: この夜が続いて欲しかった
subtitles.english: ...I wanted this night to go on.

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 新宝島 作詞・作曲：山口一郎
subtitles.english: Shin Takarajima Lyrics/Composition: Ichiro Yamaguchi

subtitles.original: 次と その次と
subtitles.english: The next, and the one after that,

subtitles.original: その次と線を引く 続けた
subtitles.english: and the one after that, drawing lines, I continued.

subtitles.original: 次の目的地を
subtitles.english: The next destination,

subtitles.original: 目的地を描くんだ
subtitles.english: I'm painting the destination.

subtitles.original: 宝島
subtitles.english: Treasure Island.

subtitles.original: このまま君を連れて行くよ
subtitles.english: I'll take you away just like this.

subtitles.original: 丁寧 丁寧 丁寧に描くと
subtitles.english: Carefully, carefully, if I paint it carefully...

subtitles.original: 揺れたり 震えたりした線で
subtitles.english: ...with lines that swayed and trembled...

subtitles.original: 丁寧 丁寧 丁寧に描くと
subtitles.english: ...carefully, carefully, if I paint it carefully...

subtitles.original: 決めていたよ
subtitles.english: ...I had decided.
